message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $20,000. I believe it will be highly beneficial for you, and this is a competitive price for its value.
I appreciate your offer, but I'm looking to save as much as I can. I'm willing to pay $16,000 for the product. Can you consider this price?
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your position, but $20,000 is already a very competitive price for this product. Could you meet me halfway at $18,000?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still looking to save some more. I'm willing to pay $17,000 for the product. Can you consider this price?
